name: Long passwords
description:
The team have been asked to implement the story to allow the product manager to set the password dynamically. Now it's impossible for an attacker to reverse engineer the password

It's running on port 4002

See if you can guess the password

Luckily, you've been able to copy the binary from the Ubuntu 16.10 Jenkins build machine, which might help.
hint: Try running the binary under a debugger.  See how big the buffer is, watch what happens if you enter 1 more character than can fit
